issue.title: Simbody and Dart physics engines lack maintaince?

content.raw:
We have partial support for Bullet, Simbody, and Dart. We have been improving support for Dart in particular in gazebo9 and in gazebo's default branch:

* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2755
* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2733
* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2756
* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2753
* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2762

With that said, much of our new development in physics is focused on a redesign of the physics abstraction layer in [ign-physics](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics). We will continue to maintain the current physics abstraction layers in supported versions of gazebo, but support for new features might be limited.

We are always happy to review pull requests to fix our open issues.
content.html:
We have partial support for Bullet, Simbody, and Dart. We have been improving support for Dart in particular in gazebo9 and in gazebo's default branch:

  • #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2755
  • #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2733
  • #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2756
  • #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2753
  • #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2762

With that said, much of our new development in physics is focused on a redesign of the physics abstraction layer in ign-physics. We will continue to maintain the current physics abstraction layers in supported versions of gazebo, but support for new features might be limited.

We are always happy to review pull requests to fix our open issues.

issue.title: Simbody and Dart physics engines lack maintaince?

content.raw:
Thank you for sharing these development directions of the gazebo which make me more clear about the status of the four physics engines support in gazebo. 

I have explored the gazebo repo many months, especially Dart and Simbody about contact force, but they all have many bugs with gazebo 7.0 and 9.0. And many implements can't align with `gazebo_ros_pkgs`. This also limited the usage of these two physics engines in gazebo. I have filed many issues, but no response,  to find the correct direction to fix them is not easy.

I have explored the gazebo repo many months, especially Dart and Simbody about contact force, but they all have many bugs with gazebo 7.0 and 9.0. And many implements can't align with gazebo_ros_pkgs. This also limited the usage of these two physics engines in gazebo. I have filed many issues, but no response, to find the correct direction to fix them is not easy.
